name: Tammy Provost
text: All ways there for you. I love coming in the morning and the best place. I have never liked any other place because your just a number. But not at this place. Thank you for for caring

name: Rachel Super
text: Went here numerous times during our vacation, and all employees were super friendly & helpful. Had all the products we were looking for and for a good price.

name: Cpt Britches
text: Carly, Tony, Tammy,  and all the other techs are immensely, and significantly valuable to making the process run smoothly and enjoyably. Also, Carly is da cutest ever.

name: Jessica Jones
text: The pharmacist Carly is always so helpful along with the techs. Best pharmacy by far on the island!

name: Kim Williams
text: They Have A Neighborhood Business Feel..They Know Their Customers Personally..I Love That !!

name: NathanS Smith
text: Always super nice. Been going there for 7 years and I've never had a problem!!

name: Pamela Gardner
text: Such horrible employees go to the one in orange beach they are such nice people n smarter too.

name: Stephen FarmD
text: Had the specific contact solution we needed!

name: Tambi Smith
text: Excellent customer service.  Noel is friendly and knowledgeable.  Please note that parking is limited and some of the parking spaces are very near a busy street,  N.Florida Street.  Limited Seating Space.  Will accept walk-ins and you can call for an appointment.

name: Sharon Condon
text: Pep in my step with style, socks; service by a professional appreciated

name: Radical By Choice
text: Noel was very attentive to my needs and was able to get me what I needed after determining my fit. I would highly recommend to anyone with special shoe needs.

name: Noel Miller
text: Moved to 107 N. Florida St. next to Southern Glass.

name: John Ded
text: Went looking for a pair of boots, seemed to be having some trouble finding a pair that fit my feet, the owner came out and mentioned 2 pairs, the first fit was spot on, very knowledgeable and very courteous / professional, will definitely come back to them when i need a new pair

name: Lisa Steffan
text: Omg super awesome friendly and great service.  i bought these gorgeous boots.

name: James Mitchell
text: This place is great ! Such a nice and helpful young lady that help me with getting my boots repaired . They have an awesome selection of shoes and boots you can buy. Do what I did and check them out you'll be pleasantly surprised !

name: Jean Drake
text: They do excellent work in repairs also good looking shoes and booths brand new for sale.

name: Conner's Corner Watches and Militaria
text: Dropped off a bag to get a new strap put on, was told 6-8 weeks. After 8 weeks, I called and was informed "We didn't mean 8 weeks on the dot, it'll be another week". After nearly THIRTEEN WEEKS, with NO phone call, I just had to pick up my bag and get a refund. They could not do as they said they could, and NOTHING had been done to my bag. They then chose to notify us that the person that was supposed to be working on my bag was fired. EXTREMELY disappointed in GEM Shoe Repair.

name: Jon J. Cardwell
text:
Got a pair of Neil M boots (Dawson). This brown leather dress boot with genuine welt construction is not only handsome, it may also be the most comfortable footwear I’ve ever put on my size 12 pods. The full-grain premium brown leather presents a vintage look appropriate for dress or casual occasions, which is versatility I absolutely love. I love this footwear.

The service from Gem Shoe Repair parallels the care, quality and craftsmanship of the  Neil M line, which is what you’d want (and expect) from a shoe store with such high-end offerings. The staff at Gem allowed me to try on nearly a dozen pair of shoes before I finally settled on the Neil M boots. They were kind, friendly, helpful and genuinely concerned with my feet receiving the very best care and quality I could ever receive from footwear and foot care professionals.

I most highly recommend Gem Shoe Repair and will see them first anytime and every time I am looking to make a purchase which is in some way connected to my feet. Great job folks! Thanks so much! 5+ Stars!

name: Dorothy Mitchell
text: Perfect shoe repairs! Great to have this service available.  They also sell shoes and inserts.

name: 4joslen
text: Great store. Bought the best pair of boots I've had from here. I've worn them for the last 4 years everyday to work. Carolina brand work boots (Made in the USA).  Great service and  received a great boot education as well. Headed back to have new soles put on.

name: Lisa Weaver
text: People were very helpful to me. Helped me pick the right shoes for me.

name: Cassie Booth
text: Very disappointed.  After calling and being assured that they "clean thousand dollar boots everyday" and they knew what they were doing. I took in my leather wallet to be cleaned. After about two weeks I got a call saying my wallet was ready. When I got there to pick it up, my heart sunk. My wallet looked as if someone tried to paint it with paint that was way too light in color and had what appeared to be brush strokes all over it. I was heart broken. The wallet was a gift from a friend and means a great deal to me, not to mention it cost over $100. Thankfully, I was able to find someone who could make it look slightly better. Unfortunately, it's still not the same. I would never recommend GEM Shoe repair to anyone.

name: Richetta Logan
text: Great place to get your shoes fixed and to buy new shoes that best fit your needs.

name: Larry Currie
text: I’ve gotten shoe repair and bought shoes from them for many years.  Always excellent work and service.

name: Connie Hickson
text: They do really good work.

name: D Griffin
text: Had two rigger belts that required shortening and heavy stitching. Looked factory and great price. Highly recommend +++++

name: Christopher Taylor
text: This place is the best place. They have the best customer service there is.

name: Paula Newell
text: Took shoes in twice to be fixed and shoe strap still broke

name: Jessica Golson
text: Wonderful customer service awsome repair jobs very experienced  !!!

name: Karen Allen
text: Miss Tammy and her family are back and look forward to serving their customers. Please come see their new selections.

name: Kashaunda Swain
text: Horrible service

name: Timothy Parks
text: Awesome

name: Karmen plays
text: They fix shoes

name: Charlene Bush Ball
text: Nice shoes

name: S. Warren
text: Bought brand new Thorogood boots from them, within 1 week the boots were coming apart on the side and they refused to fix or exchange them, despite having a warranty on the boots!

name: Kelly Lampkin
text: Good people with great history.

name: Devona Laipply
text: I changed pharmacy's because I got tired of being a number. As soon as I walk in to R & R drugs, they are so nice and make my visit very nice. I really like to one on one service. Makes me happy. Thank you for your kindness.

name: Cheryl Adams
text: This is the best drug store I have ever used. The people who work here are the friendliest and most helpful. I am truly thankful I found them
